franchiseMainContentList.label: For Franchise
franchiseMainContentList.headline: The Most Advanced Futuristic Food Solution
franchiseMainContentList.desc: A cutting-edge franchise model built on a mobile app and digital production solution.

contents.headline: The First Custom Food Solution​
contents.text: The first solution that can provide customized food! Seize the vast and rapidly growing market from the very beginning.

contents.headline: Cutting-edge Digital Production Solution
contents.text: From ordering to cooking, every process is digitally controlled, enabling precise and efficient operation of your establishment.

contents.headline: Operation Based on Demand​
contents.text: Secure stable business operations based on demand through mobile app access and order processing.​

contents.headline: Cartridge System
contents.text: With block-unit ingredient supply and a digital cooking control system, everyone can easily and accurately produce meals.

franchiseCheckContentList.label: Check it out
franchiseCheckContentList.headline: How do you cooksup?
franchiseCheckContentList.desc: Choose the equipment in your kitchen.

contents.headline: How does the business work?
contents.text: All business activities are handled by the headquarters! Orders are also processed through the app at the headquarters! Focus only on cooking!

contents.headline: Worried about interior costs?
contents.text: Only the minimum requirements are needed. We help you make the most of your existing kitchen facilities and start with minimal costs.

contents.headline: Reduce labor costs!
contents.text: All menus are composed of block units and are assembled immediately upon order. Due to the very low difficulty of cooking, it can be done with minimal unskilled labor.

contents.headline: What if the trend passes?
contents.text: COOKSUP is not limited to specific genres of food! AI creates food in all genres that match the customer's health status.
